xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 09 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <raianknight> has joined #ccm 00:32 <Guest38811> has joined #ccm 00:40 <kartik_bawa> has joined #ccm 00:47 <raianknight> has left #ccm 00:47 <raianknight> has joined #ccm 01:53 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 03:24 <kartik_bawa> has joined #ccm 04:41 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 05:29 <raianknight> has joined #ccm 05:31 <raianknight> Hi, could anybody answer to me about the following project idea: "Development of machine learning methods for modeling the evolution of tumors" ? I didn't find any google group connected with your project ideas, only e-mails are presented 05:35 <raianknight> Does this project idea concern to one of your existing projects? In other words, is there some basic application for development such machine learning methods? 05:43 <raianknight> Also, if you think that email is more convenient way to contact each other, you may write to leontev.petr@gmail.com 06:34 <raianknight> has left #ccm 06:34 <raianknight> has joined #ccm 06:35 <raianknight> has joined #ccm 10:31 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 10:38 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 10:46 <ologn13> has joined #ccm 10:52 <ologn13> Hello Everyone ! I am a Junior CS undergraduate. While looking at projects the organisation has proposed, I found one of them interesting , i.e. "Development of machine learning methods for modeling the evolution of tumors". Can someone give more description of the project please ? 11:34 <kartik_bawa> has joined #ccm 11:47 <amdor> has joined #ccm 14:22 <ologn13> has joined #ccm 14:46 <ushakov> has joined #ccm 15:22 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 19:28 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 20:40 <blink2> has joined #ccm 22:09 <qubitex> has joined #ccm
